text:
April 27, 2018 / 1:37 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-George Feldenkreis Says On April 26, Feldenkreis And Fortress Credit Advisors Sent Letter To Perry Ellis International Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 27 (Reuters) - Perry Ellis International Inc:
* GEORGE FELDENKREIS SAYS ON APRIL 26, GEORGE FELDENKREIS AND FORTRESS CREDIT ADVISORS SENT LETTER TO PERRY ELLIS INTERNATIONAL - SEC FILING
* GEORGE FELDENKREIS SAYS IN LETTER, REAFFIRMING FELDENKREIS’ OFFER TO ACQUIRE PERRY ELLIS INTERNATIONAL IN A “GOING PRIVATE” TRANSACTION
* GEORGE FELDENKREIS - APRIL 26, AMENDED CONFIDENTIALITY AGREEMENT WITH PERRY ELLIS TO FACILITATE DISCUSSIONS, DUE DILIGENCE IN CONNECTION WITH PROPOSAL Source text: [ bit.ly/2FlItuX ] Further company coverage:
